attributes.action: stronger laws preventing pasports for edofiles in honour of madeleine mccann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we wish for passports to be taken from pedofiles and a strict law about traveling for pedofiles and laws preventing them from enttering major citys and towns near schools,in honour of madeleine mccann who could or could have not been taken by them

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
